name: petridish
description: Jekyll theme for research project websites.
author: Peter Desmet

scripts.copy-all: mkdir -p assets/theme/css && mkdir -p assets/theme/js && npm run copy-css:bootstrap && npm run copy-font:academicons && npm run copy-font:fontawesome && npm run copy-js:anchor && npm run copy-js:bootstrap && npm run copy-js:jquery && npm run copy-js:fuse && npm run copy-js:popper
scripts.copy-font:academicons: mkdir -p assets/theme/fonts && cp -r node_modules/academicons/fonts/* assets/theme/fonts && cp node_modules/academicons/css/academicons.min.css assets/theme/css/academicons.min.css
scripts.copy-font:fontawesome: mkdir -p assets/theme/webfonts && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* assets/theme/webfonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css assets/theme/css/fontawesome-all.min.css
